name: Earthquake escape
description:
This is an earthquake escape game, about how to move to a safe place at home when an earthquake occurs, and make an earthquake safe escape game.
Our protagonist kid is alone at home. Where can he move to hide in order to be safer?

-Third-person perspective
-Simple and intuitive operation method, move by clicking the left button, and squat down to avoid with the right button
-Time is tight, only 11 seconds
-Maybe the exclamation point will be a hint

Can you operate the protagonist children to safely avoid the earthquake?
